column4: hey guys,can someone give me some decent touchpad settings to put in my xorg.conf , the defaults are way too sensitive
Im also looking for some help regarding the w32codecs
does it come with ubuntu, or will I need to find the .deb packages?
I cant use repositories because my ubuntu pc doesnt connect to the internet, does that mean I'll have to go looking for the package to download?
probably, packages.ubuntu.com.  Make sure you get all the dependencies for it
put ubuntu on the windows pc is what I would do :)
the totem-xine .deb package refuses to install because it says it conflicts with totem-gstreamer
or does it not offer that as an option?
no option, just says it refuses
what exactly does that package do, are you sure I can just remove it?
use synaptic to remove it, totem-gstreamer uses gstreamer as a backend, totem-xine uses xine as a backend (for totem)
